code:
stateDiagram

    Null --> Precommitted: PreCommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Committed: CommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Deleted: CronPreCommitExpiry (Education_StudentDB)
    Committed --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Committed --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (Education_StudentDB)\nProvingDeadline (Education_GradeSync)
    Committed --> Terminated: TerminateSectors\n(Education_LMS_Portal)
    Faulty --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (Education_ContentCDN)
    Faulty --> Faulty: ProvingDeadline (Education_LMS_Portal)
    Faulty --> Recovering: DeclareFaultRecovered
    Faulty --> Terminated: EarlyExpiration (Education_ContentCDN)\nTerminateSectors (Education_ClassroomService)
    Recovering --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (Education_StudentDB)
    Recovering --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nProvingDeadline (Education_GradeSync)
    Recovering --> Terminated: TerminateSectors (Education_ContentCDN)
    Active --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Active --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (Education_ContentCDN)\nProvingDeadline (Education_ContentCDN)
    Active --> Terminated: CronExpiration\nTerminateSectors (Education_StudentDB)
    Terminated --> Deleted: CompactSectors
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
